entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
